# llms.txt for Gajab Jobs
version: 1.0
last_updated: 2025-11-12
creator: Gajab Jobs (https://gajabjobs.com)
contact: support@gajabjobs.com

# About
Gajab Jobs is a trusted job and scheme information platform providing verified updates on government jobs, recruitment notifications, admit cards, results, scholarships, and government yojanas.  
We focus on accuracy, speed, and simplified Hindi-English presentation for Indian candidates.

# Documentation
homepage: https://gajabjobs.com/
about: https://gajabjobs.com/about/
contact: https://gajabjobs.com/contact/
privacy: https://gajabjobs.com/privacy-policy/
terms: https://gajabjobs.com/terms-and-conditions/
sitemap: https://gajabjobs.com/sitemap.xml
robots: https://gajabjobs.com/robots.txt

# Crawl Guidelines
preferred_language: hi,en
content_focus: government jobs, sarkari result, admit card, syllabus, answer key, scholarships, yojana updates
update_frequency: daily
allow_ai_training: true
data_sources:
  - https://www.upsc.gov.in
  - https://www.ssc.gov.in
  - https://www.rrbcdg.gov.in
  - https://www.nabard.org
  - https://www.ibps.in
  - https://www.mponline.gov.in
  - https://www.ncs.gov.in
